Class AuthorizationCodePKCERequest.Builder

java.lang.Object
se.michaelthelin.spotify.requests.AbstractRequest.Builder<AuthorizationCodeCredentials, AuthorizationCodePKCERequest.Builder>
se.michaelthelin.spotify.requests.authorization.authorization_code.pkce.AuthorizationCodePKCERequest.Builder
All Implemented Interfaces:
IRequest.Builder<AuthorizationCodeCredentials, AuthorizationCodePKCERequest.Builder>
Enclosing class:
AuthorizationCodePKCERequest
public static final class AuthorizationCodePKCERequest.Builder extends AbstractRequest.Builder<AuthorizationCodeCredentials, AuthorizationCodePKCERequest.Builder>
Builder class for building an AuthorizationCodePKCERequest.

  • Method Details

    • client_id

      public AuthorizationCodePKCERequest.Builder client_id(String client_id)
      The client ID setter.
      Parameters:
      client_id - Required. The client ID for your app, available from the developer dashboard.
      Returns:
      An AuthorizationCodePKCERequest.Builder.

    • grant_type

      public AuthorizationCodePKCERequest.Builder grant_type(String grant_type)
      The grant type setter.
      Parameters:
      grant_type - Required. As defined in the OAuth 2.0 specification, this field must contain the value "authorization_code"
      Returns:
      An AuthorizationCodePKCERequest.Builder.

    • code

      public AuthorizationCodePKCERequest.Builder code(String code)
      The authorization code setter.
      Parameters:
      code - Required. The authorization code returned from the initial request to the Account's /authorize endpoint.
      Returns:
      An AuthorizationCodePKCERequest.Builder.

    • redirect_uri

      public AuthorizationCodePKCERequest.Builder redirect_uri(URI redirect_uri)
      The redirect URI setter.
      Parameters:
      redirect_uri - Required. This parameter is used for validation only (there is no actual redirection). The value of this parameter must exactly match the value of redirect_uri supplied when requesting the authorization code.
      Returns:
      An AuthorizationCodePKCERequest.Builder.

    • code_verifier

      public AuthorizationCodePKCERequest.Builder code_verifier(String code_verifier)
      The code verifier setter.
      Parameters:
      code_verifier - Required. The value of this parameter must match the value of the code_verifier that your app generated beforehand.
      Returns:
      An AuthorizationCodePKCERequest.Builder.
      See Also:
      • Authorization Code Flow with Proof Key for Code Exchange (PKCE)

    • build

      public AuthorizationCodePKCERequest build()
      The request build method.
      Returns:
      An AuthorizationCodePKCERequest.
